metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6338 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: In Drupal Core versions 7.x prior to 7.62, 8.6.x prior to 8.6.6 and 8.5.xprior to 8.5.9; Drupal core uses the third-party PEAR Archive_Tar library.This library has released a security update which impacts some Drupalconfigurations. Refer to CVE-2018-1000888 for details

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
